root.name: Mad Blocker Arcade
root.description: Developed using the XNA framework, Mad Blocker Live is an expansion of the original flash game featuring new features exclusive to this version of the game such as a unique 2 player battle mode and some extra block types. Mad Blocker Live is a fresh new version of the game and should be bought by anyone who used to love competitive modes in old school puzzlers like Tetris, Columns or Super Puzzle Fighter.
